name: Classy Chocolate Pound Cake Mix
description:
Moist, dense, and choco-lotty.Just add butter and water. Kosher. og trans fat per serving. (17 oz. box)

$1 donated to Share Our Strength's No Kid Hungry Campaign!!

name: The Essential 4
description:
These are the basic building blocks for everyday cooking. Everything calls for garlic, onion, and salt...and with these easy,  fast and flavorful products, there's no chopping...no crying...no mess! Plus, you'll enjoy the aroma of fresh-bakes bread in your home.

Includes Bountiful Beer Bread Mix Value Pack (3-19 oz. packs), Garlic Garlic (4.5 oz. jar), Onion Onion (4.5 oz. jar), Seasoned Salt (6.75 oz. jar), The Essential 4 Recipes.  

-There are 250 recipes using Bountiful Beer Bread Mix at tastefullysimple.com.
-1 tsp. of Garlic Garlic=about 1 clove of fresh garlic (Equivalent of 33 cloves of garlic per bottle)
-1 tbsp. of Onion Onion=about 6 tbsp. fresh onion. (Equivalent of 10 small onions per jar)
-Our Seasoned Salt is all natural and one of the most versatile products in our line. Use on meats, vegetables, eggs, pasta, and more.

name: Garlic Garlic Seasoning Blend
description:
Use everyday in place of fresh garlic-no peeling or mincing required. Add to mayonnaise and sour cream for a distinctive dip. Kosher. (4.5 oz. jar) 

Also try our Onion Onion and Bacon Bacon.

name: Bountiful Beer Bread Mix
description:
Our signature bread mix is simple to make. Just add beer or any carbonated beverage. Kosher. 0g trans fat per serving.

Also available in a value pack which makes 3 loaves for $14.49

name: Twist of Lime Margarita Mix
description:
Invite this party favorite to your next fiesta! Just add beer and tequila and freeze. Limited Time! (5.25 oz. mix) Makes 4 (8 oz.) servings.

Can also make non-alcoholic or on-the-rocks. Pair with Tempting Taco Cheese Ball Mix and Blue Aztec Chips.
